message.content:
cs.NI, cs.CR, cs.DS, cs.IT, cs.SE 

This paper deals with the security issues in Mobile Ad hoc Networks (MANETs) and proposes a novel approach to secure the Ad hoc On-demand Distance Vector (AODV) routing protocol. Therefore, the most likely category is cs.NI (Networking and Internet Architecture). The paper also discusses the security attacks and proposes a security extension for AODV, which falls under the category of cs.CR (Cryptography and Security). The paper also evaluates the performance of the proposed approach, which involves the use of metrics and analysis, falling under the categories of cs.DS (Data Structures and Algorithms) and cs.IT (Information Theory). Finally, the paper proposes a new protocol, which falls under the category of cs.SE (Software Engineering).
